name: Volcano Island
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 43.
Theme is "Sacrifices must be made"

You have to feed Lord Volcano or face the consequences...

Art & Programming by Martin A. Asteasuain

Music by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/music/)
All the sounds are from www.freesounds.org

How to play

This is basically a memory game like Simon.
The Volcano will ask for one guy in particular and you'll have to find it in the crowd.
Then he will ask for another... but remembering the previous one. So you'll have to find two.
Then three and counting... and if you make a mistake in the sequence, prepare to face the rage of the Volcano!
